entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
